summary.span: 定義所有 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項共用的屬性、方法和事件。

span.span: Defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這是當您開發自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項衍生自的主要類別。This is the primary class that you derive from when you develop custom ASP.NET server controls. 沒有任何使用者介面 (UI) 的特定功能。 does not have any user interface (UI) specific features. 如果您撰寫沒有 UI，或結合呈現其自己的 UI 其他控制項的控制項，衍生自。If you are authoring a control that does not have a UI, or combines other controls that render their own UI, derive from . 如果您正在撰寫沒有 UI 控制項，衍生自中任何控制或命名空間提供適當的啟動點的自訂控制項。If you are authoring a control that does have a UI, derive from or any control in the namespace that provides an appropriate starting point for your custom control. 類別是所有 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，包括自訂控制項，使用者控制項和網頁的基底類別。The class is the base class for all ASP.NET server controls, including custom controls, user controls, and pages. ASP.NET 網頁是的執行個體類別，繼承自類別，以及處理要求的.aspx 副檔名的檔案。ASP.NET pages are instances of the class, which inherits from the class, and that handle requests for files that have an .aspx extension. 類別直接或間接可用來當作使用者介面部分的應該仔細檢查您的 Web 應用程式，因此，若要撰寫安全程式碼及保護應用程式會接著請確定最佳作法。The class can directly or indirectly be used as part of the user interface for your Web application, and as such should be scrutinized to make sure best practices for writing secure code and securing applications are followed. 如需這些主題的一般資訊，請參閱[概觀的 Web 應用程式的安全性威脅](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)， [NIB： 安全性原則的最佳作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05)，和[重要的安全性概念](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md)。For general information on these topics, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a), [NIB: Security Policy Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05), and [Key Security Concepts](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md). 如需特定資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 顯示安全的錯誤訊息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用所套用的 HTML 的 Web 應用程式編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[驗證控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more specific information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## Examples 下列範例會示範自訂伺服器控制項衍生自類別。The following example demonstrates a custom server control that derives from the class. `InnerContent`類別覆寫方法，會檢查類別是否有任何子控制項，在頁面上，並判斷控制項的第一個子系是否為常值的控制項。The `InnerContent` class overrides the method, checks to see if the class has any child controls on the page and determines whether the first child of the control is a literal control. 如果這些條件都符合，覆寫的方法將寫入的 HTML 字串\ 您的訊息: 的常值控制項，然後關閉內容\ Web Form 網頁的標記。If both of these conditions are met, the overridden method writes the HTML string \

Your Message:, the contents of the literal control, and a closing \

tag to the Web Forms page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Classic Control Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Control Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非您覆寫它，此方法會自動將物件加入伺服器控制項的物件。Unless you override it, this method automatically adds objects to the server control's object. 這個集合是可透過存取屬性。This collection is accessible through property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用的自訂伺服器控制項方法來判斷是否項目宣告的開頭和結尾標記，此控制項之間會Web 伺服器控制項。The following example is a custom server control that uses the method to determine if elements declared between the opening and closing tags of this control are Web server controls. 如果是，它們會加入至物件`items`。If they are, they are added to an object, `items`. 當覆寫呼叫方法時，它會逐一，並將每個物件也自訂的伺服器控制項。When the overridden method is called, it iterates through the and adds each object in it to the of the custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: Applies the style properties defined in the page style sheet to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主題目錄中所定義的外觀屬性為基礎的控制項上設定樣式屬性。The method sets style properties on the control based on skin properties defined in a theme directory. 套用面板是其中一個預設面板控制項面板中指定或屬性。The skin applied is either the default skin for the control or the skin specified in the property. 方法由 ASP.NET 呼叫在網頁上的宣告式控制項。The method is called by ASP.NET for declarative controls placed on a page. 您必須呼叫方法，在以程式設計方式建立的任何控制項上的執行時間樣式表套用至控制項的面板。You must call the method on any controls created programmatically at run time for style sheet skins to apply to the control. 佈景主題面板會自動套用。Theme skins are applied automatically. 如需有關佈景主題和階層式樣式表之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information on the difference between themes and cascading style sheets, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: The style sheet is already applied.

span.span: Gathers information about the server control and delivers it to the property to be displayed when tracing is enabled for the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會收集有關頁面的 UI 階層架構所需的資訊，並將其傳遞至頁面[<追蹤>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/trace-element.md)屬性。This property gathers the information necessary about a page's UI hierarchy and passes it to the page's [<trace>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/trace-element.md) property. 當您啟用追蹤，網頁或應用程式，這項資訊會顯示在`Control Tree`trace 輸出的區段。When you enable tracing, either for a page or for your application, this information is displayed in the `Control Tree` section of the trace output. 網頁的追蹤輸出會附加至頁面; 的結尾雖然從追蹤檢視器 （trace.axd 檔案） 儲存在應用程式的根目錄中，您可以檢視應用程式的追蹤輸出。Trace output for a page is appended to the end of the page; while trace output for an application can be viewed from the trace viewer (trace.axd file) which is stored in the application's root directory. 如需有關追蹤的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 追蹤概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information about tracing, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可建立新的子控制項，例如資料繫結子樣板化資料繫結伺服器控制項中的控制項時，會覆寫子控制項狀態資訊寫入至父控制項的控制項狀態時使用。The method is used when child control-state information written to the parent control's control state is overridden as new child controls are created, such as when data-binding child controls in a templated data-bound server control. 呼叫空白子系控制項，然後再呼叫的方法方法可減少必須儲存或傳輸之控制項狀態資訊的大小。Calling the method to empty child controls before calling the method reduces the size of the control-state information that must be stored or transmitted. 當重新建立控制項的子控制項物件，請使用方法，以使它不會不會套用到新的控制項不小心清除子控制項狀態。When recreating child controls of a object, use the method to clear child control state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. 若要清除兩者的子控制項狀態和檢視狀態中，使用方法。To clear both the child control state and view state, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除子控制項的所有檢視狀態和控制狀態資訊。The method clears all view-state and control-state information for child controls. 它相當於呼叫方法和方法。It is equivalent to calling both the method and the method. 當重新建立控制項的子控制項物件，請使用方法，以使它不會不會套用到新的控制項不小心清除子狀態。When recreating child controls of a object, use the method to clear child state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫樣板化的資料繫結控制項的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method for a templated data-bound control. 如果已填入控制項繫結至資料來源，控制項的集合會使用清空方法，而方法用來移除任何已儲存的子控制項的狀態資訊。If the data source that the control binds to is populated, the control's collection is emptied using the method, and the method is used to remove any state information that had been saved for the child controls. [!code-csharp[TemplatedDataBoundControl2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl2/cs/templatedataboundcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TemplatedDataBoundControl2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl2/vb/templatedataboundcontrol.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您覆寫時，通常使用這個方法方法開發樣板化資料繫結伺服器控制項時。This method is commonly used when you override the method when developing templated data-bound server controls. 如果沒有呼叫這個方法，子控制項檢視狀態資訊寫入父伺服器控制項，但繫結資料時覆寫。If you do not call this method, child control view–state information can be written to a parent server control, only to be overridden when the data is bound. 當重新建立控制項的子控制項，使用方法，以使它不會不會套用到新的控制項不小心清除子檢視狀態。When recreating child controls of a , use the method to clear child view state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. 如需有關如何使用這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立樣板化的 ASP.NET 使用者控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2)。For more information about using this method, see [How to: Create Templated ASP.NET User Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2).

summary.span: 取得 ASP.NET 所產生之 HTML 標記的控制項識別碼。

span.span: Gets the control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.

value.span: ASP.NET 所產生之 HTML 標記的控制項識別碼。

span.span: The control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 Web 伺服器控制項轉譯成 HTML 元素， `id` HTML 元素屬性設定為值屬性。When a Web server control is rendered as an HTML element, the `id` attribute of the HTML element is set to the value of the property. 值通常用於存取用戶端指令碼中的 HTML 項目使用`document.getElementById`方法。The value is often used to access the HTML element in client script by using the `document.getElementById` method. CSS 規則通常也會使用識別碼來指定項目樣式。The ID is also often used in CSS rules to specify elements to style. 例如，下列 CSS 樣式規則選取所有`span`項目具有`id`屬性的值`ProductIDLabel`並設定其`background-color`屬性`white`:For example, the following CSS style rule selects all `span` elements that have the `id` attribute value of `ProductIDLabel` and sets their `background-color` attribute to `white`: ``` span#ProductIDLabel { background-color: white; } ``` ASP.NET 提供多種演算法如何產生屬性值。ASP.NET provides multiple algorithms for how to generate the property value. 選取要用於設定控制項的演算法及其屬性。You select which algorithm to use for a control by setting its property. 演算法所識別的下列表格中所列的列舉值。The algorithms are identified by the enumeration values that are listed in the following table. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| || 值是透過串連每個父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control. 在呈現控制項之多個執行個體的資料繫結情節中，遞增值會插入控制項之 值的前面。In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value. 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_). ASP.NET 4 之前版本的 ASP.NET 中使用此演算法。This algorithm was used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.| || 值設定為 屬性的值。The value is set to the value of the property. 如果控制項是命名容器，則對於其包含的所有控制項而言，會用來做為命名容器之階層架構的最上層。If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.| ||這個演算法用於資料繫結控制項中的控制項。This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls. 值是透過串連父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control. 如果控制項是資料繫結控制項，並且會產生多個資料列，則 屬性中指定之資料欄位的值會加入結尾處。If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end. 針對 控制項，可以指定多個資料欄位。For the control, multiple data fields can be specified. 如果屬性為空白，循序數字結尾處加入，而不是資料欄位值。If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data-field value. 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).| ||此控制項會繼承其 控制項的 設定。The control inherits the setting of its control.| 預設值頁面是。The default value of for a page is . 預設值控制項是。The default value of for a control is . 因為控制項的預設值是，模式是預設產生。Because the default for controls is , the default generation mode is . (不過，如果您使用 Visual Studio Web 專案轉換至 ASP.NET 4，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動設定網站預設Web.config 檔案中。)(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to in the Web.config file.) 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 網頁伺服器控制項識別](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在主版頁面的內容頁面內 Web 使用者控制項。The following examples show a Web user control that is inside a content page for a master page. 使用者控制項包含控制項和控制項。The user control contains a control and a control. 中所顯示的文字控制項由使用者從選取的值控制項。The text that is displayed in the control is determined by the value that the user selects from the control. 文字值會設定透過用戶端指令碼，使網頁上並沒有回傳至伺服器，才能設定此值。The text value is set through client script so that the Web page does not have to post back to the server in order to set this value. 若要取得呈現的 HTML 元素的參考控制用戶端指令碼，您必須知道控制項的值屬性。To get a reference to the HTML element that is rendered for the control in client script, you must know the value of the control's property. 不過，因為使用者控制項可以放在網頁中的任何位置，就無法事先知道哪些命名的容器會包含的控制項。However, because the user control can be put anywhere in a Web page, it is impossible to know in advance which naming containers will contain the controls. 若要確定值將會是相同值，程式碼集值設定為。To make sure that the value will be the same as the value, the code sets the value to . 下列範例示範使用者控制項。The following example shows the user control. 下列範例所包含的使用者控制項的內容頁面。The following example shows the content page that contains the user control. 下列範例顯示包含的內容頁面的主版頁面。The following example shows the master page that contains the content page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供多種演算法如何產生屬性值。ASP.NET provides multiple algorithms for how to generate the property value. 選取要用於設定控制項的演算法及其屬性。You select which algorithm to use for a control by setting its property. 演算法所識別的下列表格中所列的列舉值。The algorithms are identified by the enumeration values that are listed in the following table. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| || 值是透過串連每個父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control. 在呈現控制項之多個執行個體的資料繫結情節中，遞增值會插入控制項之 值的前面。In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value. 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_). ASP.NET 4 之前版本的 ASP.NET 中使用此演算法。This algorithm was used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.| || 值設定為 屬性的值。The value is set to the value of the property. 如果控制項是命名容器，則對於其包含的所有控制項而言，會用來做為命名容器之階層架構的最上層。If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.| ||這個演算法用於資料繫結控制項中的控制項。This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls. 值是透過串連父命名容器的 值與控制項的 值產生。The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control. 如果控制項是資料繫結控制項，並且會產生多個資料列，則 屬性中指定之資料欄位的值會加入結尾處。If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end. 針對 控制項，可以指定多個資料欄位。For the control, multiple data fields can be specified. 如果屬性為空白，循序數字結尾處加入，而不是資料欄位值。If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data-field value. 這個號碼從零開始，就會遞增 1，每個資料列。This number begins at zero and is incremented by 1 for each row. 各區段是以底線字元 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).| ||此控制項會繼承其 控制項的 設定。The control inherits the setting of its control.| 預設值頁面是。The default value of for a page is . 預設值控制項是。The default value of for a control is . 因為控制項的預設值是，模式是預設產生。Because the default for controls is , the default generation mode is . (不過，如果您使用 Visual Studio Web 專案轉換至 ASP.NET 4，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動設定網站預設Web.config 檔案中。)(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to in the Web.config file.) 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 網頁伺服器控制項識別](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下列範例所示控制項中所包含的控制項。The following example shows controls that are contained in a control. 在控制項，屬性設定為和屬性設定為`ProductID`。On the control, the property is set to and the property is set to `ProductID`. 在呈現的 HTML 中，這會建立三個`span`對應至三個元素`ProductIDLabel`控制項。In the rendered HTML, this creates three `span` elements that correspond to three `ProductIDLabel` controls. 當頁面執行，則`id`屬性`span`元素設為下列值：When the page runs, the `id` attributes for the `span` elements are set to the following values: - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_1` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_34` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_43`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 頁面上，開頭和結尾標記的伺服器控制項之間以宣告方式加入控制項時 ASP.NET 自動將控制項加入至包含的伺服器控制項。On an ASP.NET page, when controls are added declaratively between the opening and closing tags of a server control, ASP.NET automatically adds the controls to the containing server control's . 任何 HTML 標記或不會處理伺服器的文字字串會被視為物件。Any HTML tags or text strings that are not processed on the server are treated as objects. 如同其他伺服器控制項集合來新增這些。These are added to the collection like other server controls. 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取的執行個體任何伺服器控制項的類別。The property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the class for any server control. 您可以將控制項加入至集合，移除控制項的集合，或逐一查看集合中的伺服器控制項。You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將伺服器控制項的子控制項物件透過其屬性。The following example demonstrates how to add child controls to a server control's object through its property. [!code-csharp[Classic Control.Controls Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control.Controls Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Control.Controls Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control.Controls Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Furthermore, if you are planning to add controls to the controls collection programmatically, consider adding the controls in an overridden method.

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，通知使用組合實作的伺服器控制項來建立所包含的任何子控制項，以準備回傳或呈現。

span.span: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您開發了複合或樣板化的伺服器控制項時，您必須覆寫這個方法。When you develop a composite or templated server control, you must override this method. 控制該覆寫方法應該實作介面，以避免命名衝突。Controls that override the method should implement the interface to avoid naming conflicts. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器控制項樣板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[開發自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫的版本的方法。The following example demonstrates an overridden version of the method. 在此實作中，顯示複合控制項括在兩個常值的控制項，呈現 HTML 控制項。In this implementation, the composite control displays a control enclosed in two literal controls that render HTML. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/CS/compositecontrolsample1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/VB/compositecontrolsample1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 建立新的 物件來保存伺服器控制項的子控制項 (常值和伺服器)。

span.span: Creates a new object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.

returns.span: 物件，包含目前伺服器控制項的子伺服器控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫自訂伺服器控制項中的，這個方法，如果您已經建立一個集合物件，衍生自類別。Override this method in a custom server control if you have created a collection object that is derived from the class. 然後可以具現化該覆寫這個方法中的集合類別。You can then instantiate that collection class in the override of this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫方法建立的執行個體`CustomControlCollection`類別，繼承自類別。The following code example overrides the method to create an instance of a `CustomControlCollection` class, which inherits from the class. summary.span: 將資料來源繫結至所叫用的伺服器控制項及其所有子控制項。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法將資料從來源繫結至伺服器控制項。Use this method to bind data from a source to a server control. 擷取透過資料庫查詢資料集之後，通常會使用這個方法。This method is commonly used after retrieving a dataset through a database query. 大部分控制項執行資料繫結會自動，這表示，您通常不需要明確地呼叫這個方法。Most controls perform data binding automatically, which means that you typically do not need to call this method explicitly. 當您建立自訂的範本資料繫結控制項時，通常會覆寫這個方法。This method is commonly overridden when you create a custom templated data-bound control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立樣板化的 ASP.NET 使用者控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2)和[開發自訂資料繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88fe02a3-957f-4ff7-84f5-2d7ab78db4c1)。For more information, see [How to: Create Templated ASP.NET User Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2) and [Developing Custom Data-Bound Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88fe02a3-957f-4ff7-84f5-2d7ab78db4c1). 伺服器控制項上呼叫時，這個方法會解析伺服器控制項和任何其子控制項中的所有資料繫結運算式。When called on a server control, this method resolves all data-binding expressions in the server control and in any of its child controls. ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 它一開始會藉由呼叫基底方法，然後使用方法，以刪除所有子控制項和方法，以都刪除任何儲存的檢視狀態設定為這些子控制項。It begins by calling the base method and then uses the method to delete all the child controls and the method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls. 最後，屬性設定為`true`和控制項所指示的位置是新建立之控制項的檢視狀態來追蹤變更方法。Finally, the property is set to `true` and the control is instructed to track any changes to the view state of the newly created controls with the method. 這是常見的技術時將資料繫結至控制項，以確保該新的資料從先前所儲存的資料不會衝突方法呼叫。This is a common technique when binding data to a control to ensure that new data does not conflict with data stored from a previous method call. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供指定的控制項。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control. 當屬性是`true`，要套用的控制項面板會搜尋應用程式的佈景主題目錄。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果特定的控制項面板佈景主題目錄中，不會套用面板。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied. 當屬性是`false`，不會搜尋主題目錄和內容的屬性不使用。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the content of the property is not used. 佈景主題，可以在頁面、 容器或控制層級啟用。Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 控制項可以覆寫值由其父控制項，或包含網頁的設定。A control can override the value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值表示伺服器控制項是否對要求的用戶端而言保持其檢視狀態，以及它包含的任何子控制項狀態。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server control persists its view state, and the view state of any child controls it contains, to the requesting client.

value.span: 如果伺服器控制項保持其檢視狀態，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the server control maintains its view state; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態可讓伺服器控制項保持其狀態在 HTTP 要求。View state enables a server control to maintain its state across HTTP requests. 控制項檢視狀態的已啟用，如果符合所有下列條件：View state for a control is enabled if all of the following conditions are met: - 頁面屬性設定為`true`。The property for the page is set to `true`. - 控制項的屬性設定為`true`。The property for the control is set to `true`. - 控制項的屬性設定為或繼承設定。The property for the control is set to or inherits the setting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要保留這些值在 HTTP 要求，ASP.NET 會使用的執行個體類別來儲存屬性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET uses an instance of the class to store the property values. 值會再傳遞做為變數隱藏的欄位時，處理後續要求。The values are then passed as a variable to a hidden field when subsequent requests are processed. 如需檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 檢視狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information about view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 但有些的時候時則會適當地停用檢視狀態，尤其是為了改善應用程式效能。There are times when it is appropriate to disable view state, particularly to improve application performance. 比方說，如果您將資料庫要求載入伺服器控制項，再將此屬性設定為`false`。For example, if you are loading a database request into a server control, set this property to `false`. 如果未指定，將檢視狀態載入伺服器控制項，將只會覆寫資料庫查詢浪費處理器時間。If you do not, processor time will be wasted loading view state into the server control that will only be overridden by the database query. 如果是`false`，您可以使用的控制項狀態，以保存是控制項專屬的而且無法關閉像檢視狀態屬性的屬性資訊。If is `false`, you can use the control state to persist property information that is specific to a control and cannot be turned off like the view state property. 如需有關控制狀態與檢視狀態之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[vs 控制項狀態。檢視狀態範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e98c7de-a888-48df-b14e-02ec8bef7681)。For more information on the difference between control state and view state, see [Control State vs. View State Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e98c7de-a888-48df-b14e-02ec8bef7681). 如需如何啟用或停用以宣告方式針對 ASP.NET 網頁的檢視狀態資訊，請參閱。For information about how to enable or disable view state declaratively for an ASP.NET page, see . ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性`false`。The following example sets the property to `false`. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_statemanagement.cs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_statemanagement.vb.aspx#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會先檢查目前的值屬性。This method first checks the current value of the property. 如果此值為`false`、方法呼叫。If this value is `false`, the method is called. 方法通常用於複合控制項，這是用於某些子控制項的控制項或它們的功能。The method is typically used in composite controls, which are controls that use child controls for some or all their functionality. 呼叫方法時若要確定已建立子控制項，並準備好處理輸入來執行資料繫結，或執行其他工作。The method is called in order to make sure that child controls have been created and are ready to process input, to perform data binding, or to perform other tasks. 控制項是複合控制項的範例。The control is an example of a composite control. 它會建立子控制項例如， ， ， ，和控制項，這用來呈現 HTML 資料表，其中產生。It creates child controls such as , , , , and controls, which are used to render the HTML table that the generates. 在大部分情況下，自訂的伺服器控制項開發人員並沒有覆寫這個方法。In most cases, custom server control developers do not have to override this method. 如果您不要覆寫這個方法，則會使用預設的行為類似的方式。If you do override this method, use it in a way similar to the default behavior. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以確定目前的伺服器控制項的子控制項。The following example uses the method to ensure that the current server control has child controls. 然後取得或設定屬性之子系Web 控制項中目前的伺服器控制項物件。It then gets or sets a property for a child Web control in the current server control's object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/CS/compositecontrolsample1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/VB/compositecontrolsample1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的型別是，使用線性搜尋演算法來尋找項目清單中的委派。This property is of type , which uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates. 使用大量的項目時，線性搜尋演算法沒有效率。A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries. 因此，當您有大型的清單，尋找具有此屬性的項目將會變慢。Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries with this property will be slow. ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件時，名為`Click`，它加入，並從控制項移除處理常式從網頁呼叫事件時的集合。The following example creates an event, named `Click`, that adds and removes handlers from the control's collection when the event is called from a page. **請注意**本例最佳化方式控制項中加入和移除事件控制項維護這些設定的清單。**Note** This example optimizes how a control adds and removes events from the list of them that the control maintains. 如果您建立自訂控制項，並想要定義事件，使用程式碼如下所示。If you create custom control and want to define an event, use code similar to this. 在 C# 中，但不是在 Visual Basic 中，可以使用這項技術。This technique can be used in C#, but not in Visual Basic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用從函式在程式碼後置頁面中，若要存取另一個容器 （） 內的控制項，或在其他情況下，其中的目標控制項不是直接存取呼叫端存取控制項。Use to access a control from a function in a code-behind page, to access a control that is inside another container, or in other circumstances where the target control is not directly accessible to the caller. 這個方法會找出控制項只有當控制項會直接包含在指定的容器。也就是此方法不會搜尋整個階層架構中控制項的控制項。This method will find a control only if the control is directly contained by the specified container; that is, the method does not search throughout a hierarchy of controls within controls. 如需如何尋找控制項，當您不知道其直接容器資訊，請參閱[如何： 存取伺服器控制項的 ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3)。For information about how to find a control when you do not know its immediate container, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3). ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Button1_Click`事件處理常式。The following example defines a `Button1_Click` event handler. 這個處理常式叫用時，會使用方法來找出與控制項屬性`TextBox2`包含頁面上。When invoked, this handler uses the method to locate a control with an property of `TextBox2` on the containing page. 如果找不到控制項，其父代用來決定屬性以及父控制項的寫入頁面。If the control is found, its parent is determined using the property and the parent control's is written to the page. 如果`TextBox2`找不到，「 找不到控制項"寫入頁面。If `TextBox2` is not found, "Control Not Found" is written to the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以設定網頁的初始焦點至控制項。Use the method to set the initial focus of the Web page to the control. 選取的控制項，將會在瀏覽器中開啟的網頁。The page will be opened in the browser with the control selected. 方法會在轉譯頁面發出的頁面焦點指令碼的呼叫。The method causes a call to the page focus script to be emitted on the rendered page. 如果頁面未包含含有 HTML 控制項`ID`符合控制項的屬性，方法叫用，則將不會設定頁面焦點。If the page does not contain a control with an HTML `ID` attribute that matches the control that the method was invoked on, then page focus will not be set. 舉例來說，這種情況時，您將焦點設定在使用者控制項，而不是將焦點設定在使用者控制項的子控制項。An example where this can occur is when you set the focus on a user control instead of setting the focus on a child control of the user control. 在此案例中，您可以使用方法來尋找使用者控制項的子控制項，並叫用其方法。In this scenario, you can use the method to find the child control of the user control and invoke its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器控制項上設定這個屬性可以提供以程式設計方式存取伺服器控制項的屬性、 事件和方法。Setting this property on a server control provides you with programmatic access to the server control's properties, events, and methods. 藉由宣告 Web 開發人員可以設定這個屬性的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的開頭標記中的屬性。This property can be set by Web developers by declaring an attribute in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control. 如果這個屬性未指定的伺服器控制項，以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，您可以取得透過其父控制項的控制項的參考屬性。If this property is not specified for a server control, either declaratively or programmatically, you can obtain a reference to the control through its parent control's property. > [!NOTE] > 唯一的英數字元和底線字元 (_) 的組合是有效的值，這個屬性。Only combinations of alphanumeric characters and the underscore character ( _ ) are valid values for this property. 包含空格或其他無效的字元，會造成 ASP.NET 頁面剖析器錯誤。Including spaces or other invalid characters will cause an ASP.NET page parser error. ## Examples [!code-csharp[Control_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample/CS/controlclass_samples.cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Control_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample/VB/controlclass_samples.vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器控制項應該執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。Server controls should perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 您無法使用此事件; 內的檢視狀態資訊它不是尚未填入。You cannot use view-state information within this event; it is not populated yet. 您不應該在事件中，無論它是子系或父至此控制項存取另一個伺服器控制項。You should not access another server control during this event, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他伺服器控制項不一定要建立並準備好進行存取。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access. 如需有關伺服器控制項事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 伺服器控制項事件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。For more information on server control events, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3). ## Examples 下列範例會將指派的自訂事件處理常式`Calendar_Init`至`Init`事件控制項。The following example assigns a custom event handler, `Calendar_Init`, to the `Init` event of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在頁面、 容器或控制層級啟用檢視狀態。View state can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 在頁面或容器層級停用檢視狀態時，網頁或容器所包含的所有控制項已停都用檢視狀態。When view state is disabled at the page or container level, view state is disabled for all controls contained by the page or container. 屬性會指出是否啟用檢視狀態的頁面、 容器或控制項。The property indicates whether view state is enabled by pages, containers, or controls. 可能會屬性和屬性不同。It is possible for the property and the property to be different. 例如，如果包含控制項已停用，檢視狀態屬性可以是`true`時屬性是`false`。For example, if the containing the control has view state disabled, the property can be `true` while the property is `false`.

para.span: 設定網頁開發人員將屬性和屬性，指出它們是否都與您的控制項來使用檢視狀態。

span.span: Page developers will set the property and the property to indicate whether they are using view state with your control.

para.span: 使用屬性和在程式碼，以判斷是否已啟用檢視狀態，為您的控制項和所有容器中的屬性。

span.span: Use the property and the property in your code to determine whether view state is enabled for your control and for all containers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知伺服器控制項執行設定為在每個頁面要求上進行任何處理步驟。Notifies the server control to perform any processing steps that are set to occur on each page request. 您可以從這個事件來存取檢視狀態資訊和 Web 表單張貼資料。You can access view state information and Web form POST data from this event. 您也可以存取頁面控制項階層架構內的其他伺服器控制項。You can also access other server controls within the page's control hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定在控制項中的自訂範本`Page_Load`事件，自訂的範本中的子控制項的文字值將會遺失。If you set a custom template in a control during the `Page_Load` event, the text values of child controls in the custom template will be lost. 這是因為已載入的表單值。This occurs because the form values have already been loaded. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Control_Load#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control_Load/CS/control_load.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Control_Load#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control_Load/VB/control_load.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您需要指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原它的控制項狀態時，覆寫這個方法。Override this method when you need to specify how a custom server control restores its control state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫自訂 ASP.NET 控制項中的方法。The following code example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET control. 叫用這個方法時，它會判斷是否控制項狀態先前儲存的控制項，則如果是的話，設定內部屬性`currentIndex`已儲存的值。When this method is invoked, it determines whether control state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the internal property `currentIndex` to the saved value. 呼叫覆寫方法方法以指示自訂控制項使用控制項狀態。The method is overridden to call the method on the to indicate that the custom control uses control state. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的方法。The following example overrides the method for a custom ASP.NET server control. 它會建立陣列，包含傳入的檢視狀態資訊`savedState`參數，然後再呼叫的基底實作陣列的第一個索引位置的方法。It creates an array to contain the view state information passed in the `savedState` parameter, and then calls the base implementation of the method for the first index location of the array. 它會將儲存到名為的變數下, 面兩個索引位置的值指派`UserText`和`PasswordText`分別。It assigns the values stored at the next two index locations to variables named `UserText` and `PasswordText`, respectively. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當父控制項檢視狀態載入子控制項，它會建立，其做法是父控制項中的每個子控制項位置集合。By default, when a parent control loads view state into child controls it creates, it does this by the position of each child control in the parent control's collection. 一開始套用檢視狀態時，所有子控制項可能尚未建立。When view state is initially applied, all child controls might not have been created. 在此情況下，尚未建立的控制項檢視狀態儲存，並套用更新版本建立的子控制項時。In this case, the view state for controls not yet created is saved, and applied when the child controls are created later. 要套用至它的子控制項的 檢視狀態的父控制項，必須符合兩個條件：For a parent control to apply view state to its child controls, two conditions must be met: - 在回傳時，父控制項必須建立子控制項中前一個要求完全相同的順序，讓控制項的順序會維持一致。On postback, the parent control must create the child controls in exactly the same order as the previous request so that the order of the controls remains consistent. - 在回傳後, 建立的任何子控制項必須加入至父控制項的結尾集合。After postback, any child controls created must be added to the end of the parent control's collection. 如果不符合這兩項條件，如果是延遲的建立子控制項，父控制項可以使用載入檢視狀態。If these two conditions cannot be met, as in the case of the delayed creation of a child control, the parent control can load view state by using . 若要設定屬性`true`，使用父控制項的中繼資料屬性。To set the property to `true`, use the metadata attribute for the parent control.

summary.span: 取得伺服器控制項命名容器的參考，其建立唯一命名空間，在具有相同 屬性值的伺服器控制項之間作區別。

value.span: 伺服器控制項的命名容器。

span.span: The server control's naming container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET Web 應用程式中的每個頁面包含控制項階層的架構。Each page in an ASP.NET Web application contains a hierarchy of controls. 此階層不會隨著控制項是否產生 UI 使用者可見的。This hierarchy is not dependent on whether a control generates UI visible to the user. 指定控制項的命名容器是實作在階層中的其上方父控制項介面。The naming container for a given control is the parent control above it in the hierarchy that implements the interface. 伺服器控制項實作此介面會建立唯一的命名空間的子伺服器控制項的屬性值。A server control that implements this interface creates a unique namespace for the property values of its child server controls. 您可以使用屬性命名的容器子控制項，以取得其父容器的參考。You can use the property of a naming container's child control to get a reference to its parent container. 當您繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項的資料，例如建立伺服器控制項的唯一命名空間是特別重要和伺服器控制項。Creating a unique namespace for server controls is particularly important when you bind Web server controls to data, such as the and server controls. 當資料來源中的多個項目建立多個重複的控制項的子系的伺服器控制項執行個體時，可確保命名容器的這些子控制項的每個執行個體有不衝突的屬性值。When multiple entries in the data source create multiple instances of a server control that is a child of the repeating control, the naming container ensures that each instance of these child controls have property values that do not conflict. 頁面的預設命名容器是的執行個體該頁面的要求時，會產生的類別。The default naming container for a page is the instance of the class that is generated when that page is requested. 屬性包含的值，會轉譯為元素的`id`屬性的 HTML 標記中。The property contains the value that is rendered as the element's `id` attribute in the HTML markup. 根據您指派給值屬性、 值所產生的屬性可能包括識別碼物件。Depending on the value that you assign to the property, the value that is generated for the property might include the ID of the object. 當您將至、值不包含 ID物件。When you set to , the value does not include the ID of the object. 當您將為或、值將會包含來自識別碼物件。When you set to either or , the value will include the ID from the object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 網頁伺服器控制項識別](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example demonstrates using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如，和Web 控制項可以包含引發事件的子控制項。ASP.NET server controls such as the , and Web controls can contain child controls that raise events. 例如，每個資料列控制項可以包含一或多個動態範本所建立的按鈕。For example, each row in a control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates. 而不是每個按鈕分別引發事件，讓巢狀控制項的事件 」 反昇"— 也就是傳送到此命名容器。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the naming container. 依次命名容器引發的一般事件呼叫使用的參數值。The naming container in turn raises a generic event called with parameter values. 這些值可以讓您判斷哪一個個別控制項引發原始事件。These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event. 利用這個單一事件有回應，您可以不必撰寫個別子控制項的事件處理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls. ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，方法`ParentControl`。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control, `ParentControl`. 這個方法會叫用時的子控制項`ParentControl`呼叫方法。This method is invoked when a child control of `ParentControl` calls the method. 當發生這種情況時，`ParentControl`類別寫入包含 ASP.NET 網頁，第一個說明中的兩個字串，其已呼叫方法，第二個識別的原始檔控制方法。When this happens, the `ParentControl` class writes two strings to the containing ASP.NET page, the first stating that its method has been called, the second identifying the source control of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/CS/bubble.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/VB/bubble.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回物件可以用來讀取檔案中指定的內容，`path`參數。The method returns a object that can be used to read the contents of the file specified in the `path` parameter. Path 參數可以是相對或根目錄 URL 通訊協定不 (例如"~ / mySite/myFile.txt)，或實體的路徑，本機 (「 c:\mySite\myFile.txt") 或 UNC (「\\\myServer\myFile.txt")。The path parameter can be either a relative or root URL without a protocol (such as "~/mySite/myFile.txt), or a physical path, either local ("c:\mySite\myFile.txt") or UNC ("\\\myServer\myFile.txt"). 方法會使用檔案存取安全性來控制存取指定的檔案。The method uses file access security to control access to the specified file. 如果目前的 ASP.NET 使用者並沒有存取檔案，然後無法開啟檔案和擲回例外狀況，表示存取被拒。If the current ASP.NET user does not have access to the file, then the file is not opened and an exception is thrown to indicate that access was denied. 如果`path`參數指定為相對路徑，例外狀況不包含要求的檔案的實體路徑的相關資訊。If the `path` parameter specified a relative path, the exception does not include information about the physical path to the requested file.

exception.span: 存取指定的檔案遭拒絕。

span.span: Access to the specified file was denied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，例如，和Web 控制項可以包含引發事件的子控制項。ASP.NET server controls such as the , and Web controls can contain child controls that raise events. 例如，每個資料列控制項可以包含一或多個動態範本所建立的按鈕。For example, each row in a control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates. 而不是每個按鈕分別引發事件，讓巢狀控制項的事件 」 反昇"— 也就是會傳送至控制項的父代。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the control's parent. 父又會引發呼叫泛型事件使用的參數值。The parent in turn raises a generic event called with parameter values. 這些值可以讓您判斷哪一個個別控制項引發原始事件。These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event. 利用這個單一事件有回應，您可以不必撰寫個別子控制項的事件處理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls. 雖然您無法覆寫這個方法，可以處理您撰寫的控制項，或藉由覆寫引發事件反昇方法。While you cannot override this method, controls you author can handle or raise bubbled events by overriding the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂的類別， `ChildControl`，覆寫方法呼叫方法傳送至其父代 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的事件。The following code example demonstrate how to create a custom class, `ChildControl`, overriding the method to call the method that sends the event to its parent ASP.NET server control. 當使用者按一下按鈕，以在 ASP.NET 網頁，其中包含的執行個體`ChildControl`，便會產生方法上包含的執行個體的父控制項`ChildControl`，並將字串寫入"ChildControl 類別 OnClick 方法呼叫 」 頁面。When the user clicks a button in an ASP.NET page that includes an instance of `ChildControl`, it raises the method on the parent control that contains the instance of `ChildControl` and writes the string "The ChildControl class OnClick method is called" to the page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果伺服器控制項的屬性設定為`true`，這個方法會判斷頁面是否已啟用追蹤。If a server control's property is set to `true`, this method determines whether tracing is enabled for the page. 如果是的話，它會儲存與控制項相關聯的追蹤資訊，並呈現伺服器控制項內容至頁面。If so, it stores trace information associated with the control, and renders the server control content to the page. 這個方法會自動呼叫網頁呈現期間，但可覆寫自訂控制項開發人員。This method is automatically called by the page during the rendering, but can be overridden by custom control developers. ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom server control. 它會判斷目前的控制項是否有任何子控制項，其物件。It determines whether the current control has any child controls in its object. 如果是的話，它會使用來逐一查看集合的屬性。If it does, it uses the property to iterate through the collection. 當它遇到每個子控制項，它會使用來呈現子控制項，及其所有子控制項，以包含頁面的方法。As it encounters each child control, it uses the method to render the child control, and all of its child controls, to the containing page. 傳遞給這個方法的物件具現化所方法。The object that is passed to this method is instantiated by the method. [!code-csharp[Control_Sample_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/CS/control_sample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Control_Sample_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/VB/control_sample.vb#3)]

summary.span: 使用提供的 物件，輸出伺服器控制項內容至提供的 物件。

span.span: Outputs server control content to a provided object using a provided object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET Web pages 可跨越各種不同的裝置和瀏覽器，可以從網站要求資訊。ASP.NET Web pages are usable across a wide range of devices and browsers that can request information from the Web. 屬性會傳回提出要求的裝置或瀏覽器的螢幕呈現控制項的物件。The property returns the object that renders the control on the requesting device or browser's screen. 如需配接器的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff). 如果伺服器控制項的屬性設定為`true`和頁面上，啟用追蹤，則會擷取與控制項關聯的追蹤資訊。If a server control's property is set to `true` and tracing is enabled for the page, then trace information associated with the control is captured.

para.span: 在覆寫中自訂控制項，方法呼叫基底類別方法，以確保正確擷取追蹤資訊。

span.span: When overriding the method in custom controls, call the base class method to ensure trace information is correctly captured.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指定將與呈現 HTML 相容的 ASP.NET 版本。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies the ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.

value.span: 將與呈現 HTML 相容的 ASP.NET 版本。

span.span: The ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 設定這個屬性的值`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性`pages`Web.config 檔案中的項目。ASP.NET sets this property to the value of the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file. 如果`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性未設定 Web.config 檔案中，預設值是目前版本的 ASP.NET。If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute is not set in the Web.config file, the default value is the current version of ASP.NET. > [!CAUTION] > 沒有公用的 set 存取子為此屬性，但 set 存取子支援.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。There is a public set accessor for this property, but the set accessor supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 如果您在程式碼中設定這個值，結果是無法預期。If you set this value in your code, the effect is unpredictable. 每個版本的 ASP.NET 可能會以不同的方式呈現 HTML，從較早的版本。Each release of ASP.NET might render HTML differently from earlier releases. 例如，在 ASP.NET 3.5 中，如果屬性控制項是`false`，根據預設，ASP.NET 會呈現`span`項目其`disabled`屬性設為"disabled"。For example, in ASP.NET 3.5, if the property of a control is `false`, by default, ASP.NET renders a `span` element whose `disabled` attribute is set to "disabled". 在 ASP.NET 4 中，依預設，`span`項目以階層式樣式表 (CSS) 來呈現`class`屬性，而非`disabled`屬性。In ASP.NET 4, by default, the `span` element is rendered with a cascading style sheet (CSS) `class` attribute instead of the `disabled` attribute. 這可讓您指定控制項的停用的外觀，並避免無效 HTML 呈現。This lets you specify the disabled appearance of the control and avoids rendering invalid HTML. (在 HTML 4.0 和 XHTML 1.1`span`元素不支援`disabled`屬性。)(In HTML 4.0 and XHTML 1.1, the `span` element does not support the `disabled` attribute.) Web 應用程式可能包含會無法正確運作如果 HTML 轉譯變更的程式碼。A Web application might include code that would not function correctly if HTML rendering changes. 若要避免這個問題，您可以設定`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性`pages`Web.config 檔案，以指出您想要維護與相容性的先前版本中的項目。To avoid this problem, you can set the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file to indicate which earlier version you want to maintain compatibility with. 例如，如果您設定屬性`3.5`，已停用控制項將會呈現`disabled`屬性而不是 CSS 類別。For example, if you set the property to `3.5`, a disabled control will render a `disabled` attribute and not a CSS class. > [!NOTE] > 您可以將此屬性的最早版本是`3.5`。The earliest version that you can set this property to is `3.5`. 為了與舊版相容，當您使用 Visual Studio Web 專案升級至 ASP.NET 4，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動設定`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 檔案中的屬性`3.5`。To maintain backward compatibility, when you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file to `3.5`. 如果您想要呈現使用 ASP.NET 4 中推出了演算法 HTML 升級的網站時，您可以變更或移除`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性。If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm that was introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute. 大部分的情況下，由這個屬性所控制的行為是自動，而且您沒有檢查程式碼中的屬性。Most of the time, the behavior controlled by this property is automatic and you do not have to check the property in your code. 不過，如果您撰寫自訂控制項，您可能必須包含程式碼，此屬性設定為基礎的控制項的行為會改變。However, if you are programming a custom control, you might have to include code that alters the control's behavior based on the setting of this property. 例如，針對 ASP.NET 4 的自訂控制項可能會組成控制項，以及自訂控制項可能會產生改變的 JavaScript 程式碼來指定已停用控制項的外觀`aspNetDisabled`類別。For example, a custom control for ASP.NET 4 might be composed of controls, and the custom control might specify the disabled appearance of the control by generating JavaScript code that alters the `aspNetDisabled` class. 這將如預期運作是`4.0`或更新版本。This will work as expected if is `4.0` or later. 但若要取得相同作用是`3.5`，自訂控制項的程式碼必須設定控制項的`CssClass`"aspNetDisabled"的屬性時屬性是`false`。But to get the same effect when is `3.5`, the custom control's code must set the control's `CssClass` property to "aspNetDisabled" when the property is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET Web pages 皆可檢視跨越各種裝置從 Web 要求頁面的不同。ASP.NET Web pages are viewable across a wide range of devices that are capable of requesting pages from the Web. 方法會傳回控制項配接器負責呈現控制項的特定瀏覽器或裝置上要求的 ASP.NET 網頁。The method returns the control adapter responsible for rendering the control on the specific browser or device that requested the ASP.NET page. 傳回特定配接器類型的子系的類型而定所呈現的類別。The specific adapter type returned depends on the descendent type of the class that is being rendered. 如需配接器的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以傳回 URL 字串適用於用戶端存取資源的 Web 伺服器上，例如影像檔連結至其他頁面，依此類推。Use the method to return a URL string suitable for use by the client to access resources on the Web server, such as image files, links to additional pages, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法所傳回的 URL 是相對於包含控制項具現化的原始程式檔的資料夾。The URL returned by this method is relative to the folder containing the source file in which the control is instantiated. 繼承這個屬性，例如控制項和，將會傳回相對於控制項的完整的 URL。Controls that inherit this property, such as and , will return a fully qualified URL relative to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`relativeUrl`參數包含絕對 URL，URL 會原封不動地傳回。If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains an absolute URL, the URL is returned unchanged. 如果`relativeUrl`參數包含相對 URL，URL 會變更為正確無誤目前要求路徑中，以便解決瀏覽器 URL 的相對 URL。If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains a relative URL, that URL is changed to a relative URL that is correct for the current request path, so that the browser can resolve the URL. 例如，請考慮下列案例：For example, consider the following scenario: - 用戶端已要求包含具有與它相關聯的映像的使用者控制項的 ASP.NET 網頁。A client has requested an ASP.NET page that contains a user control that has an image associated with it. - ASP.NET 網頁位於 /Store/page1.aspx。The ASP.NET page is located at /Store/page1.aspx. - 使用者控制項是位於 /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx。The user control is located at /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx. - 位於 /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg 映像檔案。The image file is located at /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg. 如果使用者控制項將映像 (也就是 /Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) 的相對路徑傳遞至方法，則方法會傳回值 /Images/Image1.jpg。If the user control passes the relative path to the image (that is, /Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) to the method, the method will return the value /Images/Image1.jpg. 這個方法會使用屬性來解析為絕對 URL。This method uses the property to resolve to the absolute URL. 傳回的 URL 是供用戶端使用。The returned URL is for client use. 如需有關在網站上的資源路徑的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案路徑](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。For more information on resource paths in a Web site, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd). > [!NOTE] > 僅適用行動 Web 網頁，如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求，從行動瀏覽器需要無 cookie 工作階段，使用波狀符號 ("~ 」) 之路徑中可能會導致不小心建立新的工作階段，也可能遺失工作階段資料。For mobile Web pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions or might receive requests from mobile browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can result in inadvertently creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 若要設定路徑的屬性，例如"~ /*路徑 」*，藉由呼叫解析路徑的引數，例如"~ /*路徑"* 之前指派給屬性。To set a property with a path such as "~/*path"*, resolve the path by calling the with an argument such as "~/*path"* before assigning it to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立Web 伺服器控制項物件，並使用方法來設定路徑的映像會儲存為屬性。The following example creates an Web server control object and uses the method to set the path to the image, which is stored by the property. [!code-csharp[Control_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_ResolveUrl/CS/control_resolveurl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_ResolveUrl/VB/control_resolveurl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 儲存頁面回傳至伺服器以來，所發生的任何伺服器控制項狀態變更。

span.span: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 傳回伺服器控制項目前的狀態。

span.span: Returns the server control's current state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來儲存所需的特定控制項的作業的狀態資訊。Use the method to save state information required for the operation of a specific control. 控制項的檢視狀態資料分開儲存此控制項狀態資料。This control-state data is stored separately from the control's view-state data. 使用控制項狀態的自訂控制項必須呼叫方法之前儲存控制項狀態。Custom controls using control state must call the method on the before saving control state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫自訂 ASP.NET 控制項中的方法。The following code example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET control. 當這個方法會叫用時，它會判斷是否內部屬性`currentIndex`設定為非預設值，而且如果是的話，會將值儲存控制項狀態。When this method is invoked, it determines whether the internal property `currentIndex` is set to a non-default value and, if so, saves the value to control state. 呼叫覆寫方法方法以指示自訂控制項使用控制項狀態。The method is overridden to call the method on the to indicate that the custom control uses control state. [!code-csharp[ControlState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlState/CS/controlstatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[ControlState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlState/VB/controlstatevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 字串物件儲存控制狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端項目。

span.span: When control state is saved, a string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML element.

para.span: 覆寫這個方法來擷取控制項中使用的狀態資訊。

span.span: Override this method to extract the state information to use in your control.

para.span: 控制項狀態適用於小量的重要資料，例如頁面索引或關鍵字。

span.span: Control state is intended for small amounts of critical data, such as a page index or a keyword.

para.span: 使用大量資料的控制項狀態頁面效能造成不良的影響。

span.span: Using control state for large amounts of data can adversely affect page performance.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

span.span: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何伺服器控制項檢視狀態變更。

returns.span: 傳回伺服器控制項的目前檢視狀態。

returns.span: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端`HIDDEN`項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `HIDDEN` element. 當您撰寫自訂的檢視狀態的自訂伺服器控制項時，檢視狀態可以明確地透過管理和方法。When you author a custom server control with a custom view state, the view state can be managed explicitly with the and methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 如需實作自訂的工作階段狀態提供者資訊，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For information on implementing a custom session-state provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 當這個方法會叫用時，它會判斷控制項是否有任何子控制項，以及是否包含物件是回傳的結果。When this method is invoked, it determines whether the control has any child controls and whether the containing object is the result of a postback. 如果兩者都為 true，它會變更屬性Web 伺服器控制項，讀取`Custom Control Has Saved State`。If both are true, it changes the property of a Web server control to read `Custom Control Has Saved State`. 然後將控制項的檢視狀態儲存為陣列的物件，名為`allStates`。It then saves the view state of the control as an array of objects, named `allStates`. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以使用的面板包含一或多個主題目錄中的面板檔案中。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 屬性會指定哪個這些要套用至控制項的面板。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 面板是控制項專屬的特定;您無法共用不同類型的控制項之間的外觀設定。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types. 如果您未設定屬性，控制使用的預設面板有已定義。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果沒有面板識別碼定義為控制，則該面板適用於所有控制項，未明確參考識別碼的外觀和，未設定為停用主題。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable themes. 如果未定義識別碼面板控制，則該面板只會套用到控制其屬性設定為該識別碼。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies only to controls whose property is set to that ID. 如果主題目錄中的面板檔案未包含具有指定的面板屬性，在執行階段擲回例外狀況。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified property, an exception is thrown at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定包含目前控制項的網頁或使用者控制項的路徑。The property specifies the path to the page or user control that contains the current control. 例如，如果 Web 網頁位於http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory、屬性會傳回 「 應用程式/子目錄"。For example, if the Web page resides at http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory, the property returns "application/subdirectory". 若要傳回應用程式相對虛擬路徑 ("~ / 子目錄")，使用屬性。To return the application-relative virtual path ("~/subdirectory"), use the property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用兩次屬性。The following example uses the property twice. 在第一次方法呼叫來取得要在控制項所在的目錄路徑。The first time it is used in a method call to obtain the path to the directory in which the control resides. 在第二次方法呼叫，以取得包含在該目錄內的所有檔案的清單。The second time it is in a method call to obtain the list of all the files contained within that directory. summary.span: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 物件。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.

summary.span: 這個物件可透過 屬性存取。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的結尾會自動呼叫伺服器控制項的生命週期中的事件。This method is called automatically at the end of the event in the server control's lifecycle. 當您開發樣板化資料繫結控制項時，叫用這個方法。Invoke this method when you develop templated data-bound controls. 這個方法，系統會通知 ASP.NET 監視變更為伺服器控制項的檢視狀態，您覆寫時，就需要方法。This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to a server control's view state, which is required when you override the method. ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 它一開始會藉由呼叫基底方法，然後使用方法，以刪除所有子控制項和方法，以都刪除任何儲存的檢視狀態設定為這些子控制項。It begins by calling the base method and then uses the method to delete all the child controls and the method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls. 最後，屬性設定為`true`。Finally, the property is set to `true`. 然後使用控制項屬性來判斷是否啟用控制項的檢視狀態變更追蹤。The control then uses the property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control. 如果未啟用，方法呼叫。If it is not enabled, the method is called. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性與不同中的屬性，屬性包含識別項，為伺服器控制項的命名容器。This property differs from the property, in that the property includes the identifier for the server control's naming container. 處理頁面要求時，會自動產生這個識別碼。This identifier is generated automatically when a page request is processed. 這個屬性是特別重要，尤其區別包含重複的資料繫結伺服器控制項中的伺服器控制項。This property is particularly important in differentiating server controls contained within a data-binding server control that repeats. 重複的控制項，也就是， ， ， ，和Web 伺服器控制項 （或自訂的任何伺服器控制項，您建立包含重複的功能，當資料繫結），做為命名其子控制項容器。The repeating control, which are , , , , and Web server controls (or any custom server controls that you create that include repeating functionality when data bound), serves as the naming container for its child controls. 這表示，它會建立唯一的命名空間及其子系控制項，讓其屬性值不會產生衝突。This means that it creates a unique namespace for its child controls so that their property values do not conflict. 例如，如果您包含 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項中的伺服器控制項，並指派控制項屬性值為`MyLabel`，和 的`MyRepeater`.For example, if you include an ASP.NET Web server control in a server control, and assign the control an property value of `MyLabel`, and the an of `MyRepeater`. 如果您要的資料繫結至具有三個項目，所產生的物件每個執行個體的屬性伺服器控制項是`MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`， `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`，和`MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`。If you bind data to the to an object with three entries, the resulting properties for each instance of the server controls are `MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`, `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`, and `MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件並填入三個文字字串，然後將繫結Web 伺服器控制項中的資料，時載入的頁面。The following example creates an object and populates it with three text strings, then binds a Web server control to the data in the when the page is loaded. 程式碼會取得資料繫結期間所產生的每個子控制項的屬性。The code gets the property for each child control generated during data binding. 程式碼會產生三個版本控制項和寫入其`UniqueID`至頁面的屬性值。The code generates three versions of the control and writes their `UniqueID` property values to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts/CS/WebFormsControlIdResolution12.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts/VB/WebFormsControlIdResolution12.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器控制項都必須執行任何最後清除工作，例如關閉檔案、 資料庫連接，以及在此階段中控制生命週期的執行個體已卸載之前捨棄物件。Server controls must perform any final clean-up, such as closing files, database connections and discarding objects, during this stage of the control lifecycle before the instance is unloaded.

summary.span: 取得狀態資訊的字典，允許您在相同網頁的多個要求之間，儲存和還原伺服器控制項的檢視狀態。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 類別的執行個體，包含伺服器控制項的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the server control's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要保留這些值在 HTTP 要求，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用這個屬性，這是執行個體的類別，以儲存屬性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 值會接著為變數時傳遞至 HTML 隱藏 input 元素，處理後續的要求。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed. 如需儲存伺服器控制項檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 檢視狀態所有的伺服器控制項的預設啟用，但您會想要停用它的情況下。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 效能概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 字典和使用方式的相關資訊，請參閱[集合和資料結構](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872). ## Examples 下列範例會示範實作`Text`屬性儲存和擷取其值從其控制屬性。The following example demonstrates implementing a `Text` property that stores and retrieves its value from its control's property. summary.span: 取得或設定這個控制項的檢視狀態模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the view-state mode of this control.

value.span: 這個控制項的檢視狀態模式。

span.span: The view-state mode of this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來啟用個別控制項的檢視狀態，即使頁面停用檢視狀態。You can use the property to enable view state for an individual control even if view state is disabled for the page. 如需有關檢視狀態，以及控制項狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about view state and control state, see the property. 若要停用頁面的檢視狀態，並啟用特定控制項在頁面上，設定頁面和控制項的屬性`true`，將屬性頁面，即可，並設定屬性若要控制。To disable view state for a page and to enable it for a specific control on the page, set the property of the page and the control to `true`, set the property of the page to , and set the property of the control to . 預設值屬性頁面是。The default value of the property for a page is . 預設值屬性頁面中的 Web 伺服器控制項是。The default value of the property for a Web server control in a page is . 如此一來，如果您未在頁面或控制層級的值設定這個屬性屬性決定檢視狀態行為。As a result, if you do not set this property at either the page or the control level, the value of the property determines view-state behavior. 網頁或控制項的屬性有效果才屬性設定為`true`。The property of a page or a control has an effect only if the property is set to `true`. 如果屬性設定為`false`，檢視狀態將會關閉，即使屬性設定為。If the property is set to `false`, view state will be turned off even if the property is set to .

exception.span: 已嘗試將此屬性設定為不屬於 列舉中的值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器控制項是否會轉譯為頁面上的 UI。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as UI on the page.

value.span: 如果控制項在頁面上可見，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the control is visible on the page; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`，則不會呈現伺服器控制項。If this property is `false`, the server control is not rendered. 您應該考慮這組織您的頁面配置時。You should take this into account when organizing the layout of your page. > [!NOTE] > 如果容器控制項時，不會轉譯任何它所包含的控制項將不會轉譯即使您將以個別控制項的屬性`true`。If a container control is not rendered, any controls that it contains will not be rendered even if you set the property of an individual control to `true`. 在此情況下，個別控制項傳回`false`如屬性，即使您已明確地將它設定為`true`。In that case, the individual control returns `false` for the property even if you have explicitly set it to `true`. (亦即，如果`Visible`父控制項的屬性設定為`false`，子控制項繼承該設定，並設定優先於任何本機設定。)(That is, if the `Visible` property of the parent control is set to `false`, the child control inherits that setting and the setting takes precedence over any local setting.)
